about_the_game:
Conquer, pillage, and determine the fate of a fantasy world in Eternal Damnation, a hybrid real-time strategy RPG that places the ultimate power in your hands. Fight back against a dominant evil or destroy it and take the world for yourself - the choice is yours.

An Inter-Dimensional Tale


Given a choice between death or reincarnation following your untimely demise, Eternal Damnation thrusts players into a vast fantasy world at the behest of an ancient evil deity. Chosen for your prior acts of evil, it’s your task to conquer the world before you. How you do so is up to you.

Player choice is paramount in Eternal Damnation. Your actions will have consequences that shape the destiny of the world. It’s on you to find your place and discover what type of ruler you want to be.

Eight Legged Wreck


Wreak havoc on the world as a human arachnoid equipped with an arsenal of offensive abilities. Utilise powerful spells and weapons to give yourself the edge in combat and truly establish your place as a god-like overlord. Further, hone your combat abilities through a leveling-up system that empowers you to expand your existing arsenal while learning new spells and abilities.

A Unique Hybrid Experience


Eternal Damnation blends real-time strategy gameplay and RPG mechanics to create a thrilling hybrid experience. Gather your underlings, explore diverse locations, and battle your way through a number of exhilarating encounters. The world is your oyster and you can do with it as you wish. Just remember, your actions will have consequences. The world, its inhabitants, and even your followers will react to your choices.

King Of The Sandbox


This is a world without constraints. Follow the primary story and fight your way to total domination or venture off the beaten path. Take exploration at your own speed and discover hundreds of NPCs, environments, and quests just waiting for you. However, the actions and choices you make will permanently affect the world, so think carefully before you make a decision.

From exploration through to combat and dungeon crawling, there are countless ways to interact with the world of Eternal Damnation. Quests are designed to be open-ended, with branching narrative trees and numerous ways to finish each quest.

Keep Your Friends Close And Your Enemies Even Closer


A comprehensive faction system will measure your standing in the world. Each faction has a unique leader, units, and stronghold. How you interact with each faction will change their perception and reaction to you. Be careful though, push your luck too far and you might find factions banding together in an attempt to take you down.

There's No Place Like Home


World domination isn’t easy, which isn’t why you’ll need somewhere to rest. Build your own stronghold and customize it with distinct items that provide active bonuses. Rare items may even unlock additional features, but you’ll have to find them first...

content_descriptors.notes:
In Eternal Damnation you get the opportunity to follow the path of a villain which in return will end up with you having to make decisions between killing and inflicting violence to various characters to get your way.
Story wise you will get to make choices on how you intend to reach this goal with violence and indimidation and you also get the opportunity to use fictional drugs for story relatec content but there is no intention to include anything abuse related in regards to drugs.
There is no intention to include topics such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug and alcohol abuse, or self-harm.
